findings.title: Owner can mint any amount of tokens
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to mint any amount of tokens without restrictions.

findings.title: Owner can burn
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to burn tokens.

findings.title: Owner can change _txcontrol state
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the _txcontrol state.

findings.title: Owner Privilege: Modification of excepted_contract, excepted_sender, and excepted_receiver Arrays
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to include or modify values in excepted_contract, excepted_sender, and excepted_receiver arrays.

findings.title: Owner can change _txcontrol_contract state
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the _txcontrol_contract state.

findings.title: Owner can blacklist addresses
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to blacklist addresses.

findings.title: Owner can lock the contract (disable transactions at all)
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to disable transactions entirely, which could lead to a denial-of-service attack.

findings.title: Owner can withdraw contract BNBs
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to withdraw contract BNBs.

findings.title: Owner can withdraw foreign tokens from the contract
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to withdraw foreign tokens from the contract.

findings.title: Owner can lock and unlock owner
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to lock and unlock themselves, allowing them to retake privileges even after ownership was renounced.
